backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI background and bubble overlay updates to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of all major frontend files and their roles in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH CSS variables, light/dark themes, and global background/foreground tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that provides the root element and loads the React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component that applies theme classes and renders all site sections and layout components.
frontend/src/components/common/GlassCard: Reusable glass-style card wrapper with optional hover and neon effects.
frontend/src/components/common/NeonButto: Configurable neon-styled button component with variants, sizes, and loading support.
frontend/src/components/contact/useConta: React hook managing contact form state, validation, submission, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SectionSh: Section wrapper component providing consistent spacing and optional glass styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with social links, copyright, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with navigation, theme toggle, and mobile menu behavior.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/portfo: Defines the PortfolioItem interface and provides categorized sample portfolio items with media metadata.
Defines media types, a video media type guard, and a helper to normalize video embed URLs.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Dialog for previewing portfolio items with video or image content and close-handling logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with an image, bio text, and a tools list displayed using GlassCard components.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, success state handling, and social icons within a styled SectionShell.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the landing hero with title, tagline, and buttons that scroll to portfolio or contact sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Shows categorized portfolio grids using portfolioData and opens a preview dialog when an item is selected.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists available services with icons and descriptions inside GlassCard components.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays testimonial cards with quotes, authors, and roles in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/visual/Backgroun: Renders floating bubble background decorations using positioned divs with animated styles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToSection.ts: Offers a helper to smoothly scroll the page to a given section with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and toggling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a neon green/black theme, including backgrounds, utilities, and motion settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and theme extensions tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and requirements for updating site backgrounds to a green/black Appleâ€‘bubble theme.
